mission:
Create a hilarious 30-second TikTok ad for Papaya Bar in Rosh HaAyin! 
Start with dramatic Marvel-style hero entrance - superhero crashes through wall, exhausted and dehydrated. 
Suddenly, magical Ghibli-style transformation! The bar becomes an enchanted forest with floating papaya fruits. 
Grandma appears with glowing healing smoothie, hero drinks and transforms into muscular god. 
Cut to reality - it's just a regular person feeling amazing after a papaya shake. 
Night scene: same bar transforms into cocktail paradise with shake-based alcohol drinks. 
Young crowd partying with glowing drinks. Funny twist: drunk guy tries to order 'healthy' shake at 2am. 
End with catchy Hebrew slogan about being healthy heroes by day, party legends by night! 
Business: Shabazi 47, Rosh HaAyin, 054-222-2617, Always Open.
visual_style: marvel comics meets studio ghibli hybrid colorful vibrant

script_processing.original_script: [VISUAL: Dramatic superhero crashes through a wall, looking exhausted and dehydrated.] DIALOGUE: אוי, אני גמור! צריך כוח! [VISUAL: The bar transforms into an enchanted forest with floating papaya fruits. Grandma offers a glowing smoothie.] DIALOGUE: קסם הג'ונגל! סבתא תרפא אותך! [VISUAL: Person drinks the shake, looks energized. Cuts to night, bar is a cocktail paradise, young crowd partying with glowing drinks. Drunk guy asks for a 'healthy' shake.] DIALOGUE: גיבורי היום, אגדות הלילה! בריאות או מסיבה? [VISUAL: Papaya Bar logo, address, phone number, and 'Always Open' flash on screen.] DIALOGUE: פפאיה בר, שבזי 47, ראש העין. תמיד פתוח!
script_processing.final_script: ‏אוי, אני גמור! צריך כוח! קסם הג'ונגל! סבתא תרפא אותך! גיבורי היום, אגדות הלילה! בריאות או מסיבה
